title: Order Brella Replica
content:
The Order Brella Replica is a main weapon in Splatoon 3. It is a reskin of the Splat Brella, and a direct successor to the Splatoon 2 Hero Brella Replica.

The Order Brella Replica is designed to look like a simplified version of the Splat Brella, containing only white and gray colors.

The Order Brella Replica comes with Sprinkler and Triple Inkstrike. The Order Brella Replica's stats, sub weapon, and special weapon are identical to those of the Splat Brella.

To unlock the Order Brella Replica, the player must complete Side Order with Marina's Palette.

- The Order Brella Replica is a middleweight weapon.

- The matchmaking range is 12.5. The game's matchmaking system looks at a team's average matchmaking range value, and matches them against a team with a similar average.

- The Order Brella Replica has a canopy with 500 HP, and regenerates 2.5 HP per frame (150 HP per second) when the canopy is not active and not destroyed.
Brella canopies have different incoming damage multipliers for each weapon type.

- Brella canopies have different incoming damage multipliers for each weapon type.

- The canopy does 30 damage on contact with a cooldown of 30 frames.

- After firing, the canopy takes 12 frames to open.

- The canopy takes 110 frames to launch once it is open (1.83 seconds).
The canopy initially travels at a speed of about 0.132 units per frame, and remains onstage for 5 seconds. During this time, all damage to the shield is multiplied by 0.5.

- The Order Brella Replica fires 11 pellets per shot.

- Pellets fly straight at 2.6 units per frame for 3 frames, covering a distance of 7.8 units.
After that, the speed of the pellets is set to 1.652 units per frame if it is not already lower than the listed value, and they lose 36% of their speed every frame (including the first frame after they stop traveling straight). Once the velocity decreases below a certain threshold, they will begin to be slowed less and fall faster.
